body: This is the average difficulty class (DC) for any spells, spell-like abilities, and special abilities (such as breath weapons) possessed by a creature of this CR that relies on such attacks in combat. If an ability is particularly powerful, it might have a lower DC to compensate.
url: pfsrd://Bestiary/Rules/Monster Creation/Building the Monster/Step 2 Target Statistics/Primary Ability DC
name: Primary Ability DC
